channel.title: Need help with power miner
channel.description:
powerminer with banking and walkback, should be mostly working make a text file in Configs/ called paths.txt in there, an entry 0=x1,y1,x2,y2,xn,yn the path needs to start at mine and end at bank specify multiple paths with the path= argument
walkback is untested
usage: /powerMiner([optional bank,][optional walkback,][optional path=int,]id1,id2,idn)
by eXemplar
-------------------------------------------------------------------- this is given in the note pad.....in the starting......But i dont understand how to enter the digits into path.exe ----------------------------------------------- Actually i want a coal miner who can mine coal in the lumbridge swamps and then go to the bank at draynor....... I actually dont know how to program java so people please help me out with this.... :)
Hope i get a reply...
Sky Diploma[br][size=1]Posted at: May 10, 2006, 08:11:24 am[/size][hr]oops i mean path.txt(not path.exe) sorry. about that
But any way please help me out.....and if u can please teach me how to write the script...
Thanks.

item.title: Need help with power miner
item.dc:creator: @sky_diploma sky diploma
item.description:
@sky_diploma wrote:

powerminer with banking and walkback, should be mostly working
make a text file in Configs/ called paths.txt
in there, an entry 0=x1,y1,x2,y2,xn,yn
the path needs to start at mine and end at bank
specify multiple paths with the path= argument

walkback is untested

usage: /powerMiner([optional bank,][optional walkback,][optional path=int,]id1,id2,idn)

by eXemplar

this is given in the note pad…in the starting…But i dont understand how to enter the digits into path.exe

Actually i want a coal miner who can mine coal in the lumbridge swamps and then go to the bank at draynor…
I actually dont know how to program java so people please help me out with this…

Hope i get a reply…

Sky Diploma[br][size=1]Posted at: May 10, 2006, 08:11:24 am[/size][hr]oops i mean path.txt(not path.exe) sorry. about that

But any way please help me out…and if u can please teach me how to write the script…

Thanks.
